name: [Vortex] Revolver
desc: An energy-storage type W-Engine with a unique operation circuit. It will absorb scattered energy up to a certain amount before unleashing it, dealing some extra impact. It's impossible to control when that energy is unleashed, but when it is, it'll give you the joy of winning a prize draw.
desc2: Equip to increase Stun Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: An energy-storage type W-Engine with a unique operation circuit. It will absorb scattered energy up to a certain amount before unleashing it all at once.
phaseDescs: <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</ct> inflict <ct color=#2BAD00>10%</ct> more Daze.
<ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</ct> inflict <ct color=#2BAD00>11.5%</ct> more Daze.
<ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</ct> inflict <ct color=#2BAD00>13%</ct> more Daze.
<ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</ct> inflict <ct color=#2BAD00>14.5%</ct> more Daze.
<ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attacks</ct> inflict <ct color=#2BAD00>16%</ct> more Daze.
